attributes.action: Force the broadcasting authorities to give a more balanced representation of Christianity on TV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All soaps and most television programmes give a very unbalanced representation of Christianity. Christians are portrayed either a interfering old busybodies going to a cold impersonal church once a year or as wacko. Whilst this may be true of some people who proport to be Christians it is certainly not a balanced representation.
